title: Best OnePlus 13R screen protectors
description: Protect your OnePlus 13R display with these screen protectors. The post Best OnePlus 13R screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Protect your OnePlus 13R display with these screen protectors.
text: The OnePlus 13R is a new budget Android smartphone with flagship-level specifications. It sports a 6.78-inch LTPO AMOLED display with 1,264 x 2,780 pixels resolution. The panel supports HDR10+, Dolby Vision, 120Hz refresh rate, and 4,500 nits peak brightness. OnePlus offers Corning Gorilla Glass 7i display protection. While this is good to have, it is not the ultimate display security. You will need a good-quality screen protector for complete peace of mind. It will ensure that your phone’s display does not get scratched or damaged. Here are the best OnePlus 13R screen protectors. Natbok Screen Protector (2+2 pack) This 9H rated screen protector comes with 2.5D rounded edges. It is said to align perfectly with the phone's curved edges. It has 0.33mm thickness and can withstand a 6-foot drop. Hydrophobic and oleophobic coating keeps fingerprints and sweat away. It also has two camera lens protectors. Sale Aiziki Screen Protector (2 pack) This is a 9H rated screen protector with a fingerprint-resistant oleophobic layer. It offers complete edge-to-edge protection from scratches and accidental damage. Its precise design helps with easy installation with no bubbles. Sale HOMEMO Screen Protector (2 pack) It is an unaffordable screen protector with 9H hardness rating. It has oil and fingerprint-resistant properties. It is easy to install and provides complete protection for the smartphone. There are two screen protectors in the package. Sale Supershieldz Screen Protector (3 pack) This is a 9H hardness rated screen protector. It has 2.5D rounded-edge glass along with anti-bubble and rainbow-effect-proof capabilities. There is a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating for reducing sweat and fingerprints. ArmorSuit Screen Protector (2 pack) It is a thin film screen protector made of scratch-proof, ultra-tough, clear, and yellow-resistant material. Self-repair tech takes care of minor scratches. You get two screen protectors, installation spray, squeegee, and a microfiber cloth with the package. Beukei Screen Protector (3 pack) This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat. html:
The OnePlus 13R is a new budget Android smartphone with flagship-level specifications. It sports a 6.78-inch LTPO AMOLED display with 1,264 x 2,780 pixels resolution. The panel supports HDR10+, Dolby Vision, 120Hz refresh rate, and 4,500 nits peak brightness.

OnePlus offers Corning Gorilla Glass 7i display protection. While this is good to have, it is not the ultimate display security. You will need a good-quality screen protector for complete peace of mind. It will ensure that your phone’s display does not get scratched or damaged. Here are the best OnePlus 13R screen protectors.

Natbok Screen Protector (2+2 pack)

This 9H rated screen protector comes with 2.5D rounded edges. It is said to align perfectly with the phone's curved edges. It has 0.33mm thickness and can withstand a 6-foot drop. Hydrophobic and oleophobic coating keeps fingerprints and sweat away. It also has two camera lens protectors.

Sale

Aiziki Screen Protector (2 pack)

This is a 9H rated screen protector with a fingerprint-resistant oleophobic layer. It offers complete edge-to-edge protection from scratches and accidental damage. Its precise design helps with easy installation with no bubbles.

Sale

HOMEMO Screen Protector (2 pack)

It is an unaffordable screen protector with 9H hardness rating. It has oil and fingerprint-resistant properties. It is easy to install and provides complete protection for the smartphone. There are two screen protectors in the package.

Sale

Supershieldz Screen Protector (3 pack)

This is a 9H hardness rated screen protector. It has 2.5D rounded-edge glass along with anti-bubble and rainbow-effect-proof capabilities. There is a hydrophobic and oleophobic coating for reducing sweat and fingerprints.

ArmorSuit Screen Protector (2 pack)

It is a thin film screen protector made of scratch-proof, ultra-tough, clear, and yellow-resistant material. Self-repair tech takes care of minor scratches. You get two screen protectors, installation spray, squeegee, and a microfiber cloth with the package.

Beukei Screen Protector (3 pack)

This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat.
